title: "Pixel Space Station"
content:
# Pixel Space Station

Welcome to Pixel Space Station, your go-to destination for all things retro-futuristic! Our website is dedicated to showcasing the best of pixel art, with a particular focus on space-themed designs.

Our collection features a wide variety of pixel art depictions of space stations, rockets, planets, and more. Each design is carefully crafted by talented artists to capture the unique aesthetic of classic video games and sci-fi movies.

Whether you're a fan of retro gaming or simply appreciate the charm of pixel art, you'll find something to love on our site. So come explore the cosmos with us and discover the beauty of pixelated space!

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A pixel art depiction of a space station, with blocky shapes and limited colors that create a retro and futuristic feel."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
